column2: I'm going to say it: Uchi is only "meh" when you consider bang for your buck. The fish is extremely fresh
column3: but almost everything comes with a(n overly sweet) sauce. The wait staff is fantastic and I can really appreciate some of the more creative takes on sushi and other Japanese foods
column4: but I just think that Kata Robata and MF do upscale sushi better. (That being said
column5: I wouldn't turn down an invitation to return... it just wouldn't be my pick.)
